sentences.en: There are various reasons that impel me to that conclusion.
sentences.cn: 有各种原因促使我作出那个结论。

sentences.en: These verbs mean to constrain or impel to action.
sentences.cn: 这些动词指限制或促使行动。

sentences.en: But all these can only take our power to impel us to go forward.
sentences.cn: 而这一切只能作为我们的动力去推动我们前进。
